name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Wallace & Gromit
summary: Wallace & Gromit have opened a mini golf course at 62 West Wallaby Street! Filled with ingenious contraptions to delight both die-hard fans and curious newcomers, you'll be swept away on a fun-filled journey through iconic moments from the beloved films. Grab a club and get cracking!
